TITLE: Two potential opportunities for value creation emerge as Starboard takes a stake in Salesforce
SUMMARY: Activist Starboard Value recently revealed a stake in Salesforce. Here’s what could be next.

TITLE: SPAC liquidations top $12 billion this year as sponsors grapple with tough market, new buyback tax
SUMMARY: Under the new provision in the Inflation Reduction Act, SPAC sponsors could face a 1% exercise tax if they return cash to investors starting 2023.

SUMMARY: Jeff Smith said significant opportunity remains in the enterprise software maker.

TITLE: Dan Loeb's Third Point builds stake in Colgate, sees value in pet food business in potential spinoff
SUMMARY: Loeb said he sees hidden value in Colgate's subsidiary, Hill's Pet Nutrition, a pet food company, if it were spun off.

SUMMARY: TipRanks analyst ranking service pinpoints Wall Street's best-performing stocks, including Meta & Papa John's.

SUMMARY: Global money market funds saw the largest weekly inflows since April 2020 as investors seek safety to ride out the turmoil.

TITLE: Activist ESG investing  — the Goldilocks of responsible investing
SUMMARY: There is a disconnect between ESG as a philosophy and as an investment product. Activist investors are poised to push for meaningful change that can add value.

TITLE: The Fed is going to cause 'unbelievable calamities' if they keep hiking, according to Barry Sternlicht
SUMMARY: Billionaire Barry Sternlicht thinks the Federal Reserve's rate hikes are the wrong policy and will further hurt the global economy and markets.

TITLE: Thoma Bravo-backed workplace software firms merge as shift to hybrid work creates new opportunities
SUMMARY: The shift to hybrid and remote work is an opportunity for workplace technology companies like Condeco and iOffice + SpaceIQ.
